author: Samsung
description:
Getting ready for a first date? Vision AI Companion got your back! 💕
Whether it’s curating art as a talk-starter, recommending the perfect spot, or finding music that hits just right – Samsung Vision AI companion has got every detail covered with one tap on the remote.

#VisionAICompanion #SamsungVisionAI #VisionAI #SamsungAITV #AITV
title: Ask your companion anything: First date | Samsung
